function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased human-machine interaction","Impact":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through increased interaction between humans and machines","Mitigation":"Implement hygiene protocols and use of contactless technology to reduce physical interaction","Technologies":"Contactless technology, automation, disinfection systems","People":"Employees, customers, visitors","Owner":"Employers, business owners"},{"Description":"Slow movement of the Internet of Things towards humanization","Impact":"Reduced ability to personalize and humanize technology for better health and safety measures","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development for human-centric IoT solutions, prioritize human-focused design","Technologies":"Human-centered IoT solutions, biometric sensors, personalized health monitoring devices","People":"Technologists, researchers, business leaders","Owner":"Technology companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Scientific studies on indoor air quality","Impact":"Identifying potential health hazards and sources of contamination in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implement improved ventilation systems, air filtration, and regular monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, filtration systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, facility operators"}]}
